mapper.insert: INSERT INTO issuetable (issuekey, labels, title, status, assingee, issuedate, duedate) VALUES (#{issueKey}, #{labels}, #{title}, #{status}, #{assignee}, #{issueDate}, #{dueDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE labels = VALUES (labels), title = VALUES (title), status = VALUES (status), assingee = VALUES (assingee), issuedate = VALUES (issuedate), duedate = VALUES (duedate)
